name: add_task
description: Create a new task for the authenticated user. Use this when user expresses intent to create, add, or remember something.

user_id.description: ID of the user creating the task (auto-injected by agent, not from user input)

title.description: Task title extracted from user's natural language input

description.description: Optional detailed description of the task

task_id.description: Auto-generated ID of the created task

status.description: Confirmation that task was successfully created

title.description: Echo of the created task title for confirmation

errors.message: Title is required and must not exceed 500 characters

input.title: Finish Q4 report
input.description: Complete financial analysis and projections for Q4 2025

usage_patterns: User says: 'Add buy milk to my list' → title='Buy milk'
User says: 'Remind me to call mom tomorrow' → title='Call mom'
User says: 'I need to finish the report' → title='Finish the report'
